name: Candy Tools
description:
Did you purchase Candy Land and realize it comes with a silly wheel instead of the cards? Is printing and cutting out homemade cards way too much effort for you? CandyTools has you covered no matter what version of the game you own. Enjoy Candy Land the way it was meant to be played.

Brought to you from the maker of hit apps like ScatTools, Focus Grid, and everyone's favorite, HawkSounds. CandyTools is a late night programming venture gone way right!
